name: adc_ltm_vip_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()



def getLTMVIPList():
    '''
    To get the list of LTM VIP

    '''

    ltm_vip_list = []
    db_filter = {'code': 'vs'}
    adc_ltm_vip_list = connect_db.appviewx.ro.find(db_filter)
    for device in adc_ltm_vip_list:
        ltm_vip_list.append(device)
    return ltm_vip_list
description: To get a list of LTM vip
_keywords: To get a list of LTM vip
